Carmen

Korean: 카르멘

Hometown:

Denpasar, Bali

Indonesia

Full name:
Nyoman Ayu Carmenita

19 years old
Height:
5'6" (168 cm)
Group (2022-present):
Hearts2Hearts

Introduction

Carmen is an Indonesian singer under SM Entertainment. She is the oldest member of the South Korean girl group Hearts2Hearts.

SM Entertainment:
Jan 1, 2023-present

Feb 24, 2025

Fun facts

1
She won 1st place in a women's high jump athletics competition during Bali's student sports week in 2018
…
2
Carmen can play the piano and the guitar.
…
3
Carmen is the first Indonesian to successfully debut under SM Entertainment.
…
4
Carmen sang about 100 songs before actually passing the SM audition and going to Korea.
…
5
Carmen didn't tell her parents about the SM audition until she actually passed.
…
6
Carmen was the president of her class at her former school.
…
7
Carmen introduces herself as the sunshine of the group at their debut showcase.
